title: India's Nifty 50 jumps 3% as long-awaited trade deal with U.S. boosts investor sentiment
summary_full: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday stateside said that U.S. will cut reciprocal tariff on India to 18% from 25%.
summary_public: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday stateside said that U.S. will cut reciprocal tariff on India to 18% from 25%.
